info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 19 at 5:51PM EDT until March 19 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LUZERNE COUNTY... At 551 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Hazleton, or near Hazleton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hazleton, West Hazleton, Freeland, Conyngham, Jeddo, Woodside-Drifton, Drifton, Rock Glen, Drums and Weston. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
